name: Glitch in the System (Tribe Games)
description:
Glitch in the System is a 2D twin stick shooter.

You came upon a top-secret military base. While looking around you learn of sensitive Intel that could compromise the whole operation, but you are seen in the process. You escape to the entrance of the base but end up trapped and must fight off the waves of enemies.

You have become a Glitch in the System.

Glitch in the System is available with new updates and features from the original release:

  • Better support for more resolutions including ultrawide
  • Wider range of support for different controllers
  • Better balance gameplay for an even tighter experience
  • Online Leaderboards

and it is all FREE!

SoundtrackJam out to the tunes to the original soundtrack. Including a bonus track of the original song.Also available on Bandcamp and SoundCloud Available on:
